  • Method Details

    • hoverOverButtonEnter

      private void hoverOverButtonEnter(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the 'On Mouse Entered' event of the buttons. Changes the background color of buttons, when cursor hovers over them.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by "On Mouse Entered" action.

    • hoverOverButtonExit

      private void hoverOverButtonExit(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the 'On Mouse Exited' event of the buttons. Changes the background color of buttons, when cursor stops hovering over them.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by "On Mouse Exited" action.

    • loadApp

      private void loadApp(javafx.event.Event event) throws IOException
      Loads and displays the main application user interface.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggers the loading of the application interface.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while loading the FXML file.

    • connectOnlineDB

      private void connectOnlineDB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Triggers the loadApp function, if connection with database is established.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by "onlineButton" button;

      private void connectOfflineDB(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action of connecting to the offline database and loading the application interface.
      Parameters:

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resource)
      Initializes the application's user interface upon startup. This method is automatically called by JavaFX after the FXML file is loaded.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resource - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
